Package com.gptx.climbofduty2.gameobjects

Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
com.gptx.climbofduty2.gameobjects.GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, Enemy, Platform, Player, PowerUp
public class GameObject extends Object
Superclass for all characters/objects in the game
Author:
Sanatan Mishra

  • Constructor Details

    • GameObject

      public GameObject(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs a GameObject object with an initial velocity of 0 in both the x and y directions
      Parameters:
      x - initial x-coordinate of object
      y - initial y-coordinate of object
      width - width of object
      height - height of object

    • GameObject

      public GameObject(int x, int y, int width, int height, double xVel, double yVel)
      Complete constructor of GameObject class
      Parameters:
      x - initial x-coordinate of object
      y - initial y-coordinate of object
      width - width of object
      height - height of object
      xVel - initial velocity in x-direction
      yVel - initial velocity in y-direction

    • collidesWith

      public boolean collidesWith(GameObject other)
      Method to check if this GameObject collides with another
      Parameters:
      other - other object to check if the objects collide
      Returns:
      true if the objects collide, false otherwise

      public void update()
      Updates the location of the GameObject based on its velocity and applies frictional and gravitational forces.
